mention.text: the neighborhood church. ; `` People think that maybe God was trying to punish us , '' said Tolentino , her hands
The Tolentinos and 100 other poor families along the Albacan River in Angeles
a once-bustling city of 280,000 people in the shadow of Mount Pinatubo
director of the Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology
wife of an Air Force sergeant
help. ; `` It 's about time we left , '' said Lisa Hedland , wife of an Air Force sergeant
Santiago , a widow , whose face showed signs of the wrenching fear of the past week
nearly 5,000 refugees who crowded Monday into the shaded bleachers of a Manila sports stadium that is being used as an evacuation center.
Romayo Garcia , a 29-year-old mason , whose house near the now-evacuated Clark Air Base , about 10 miles east of Mount Pinatubo , had collapsed from the weight of volcanic ash.
